help.cmd_check_filters: Check the filter setup for possible problems
help.cmd_create_dumpers: Create all MITM related Dump Entries, Files
help.cmd_check_dumpers: Check the dump manager setup for possible problems
help.cmd_create_injects: Create all MITM related injection manager settings
help.cmd_check_service: Check the state of a service
help.cmd_list_service: List all service with the specified state
help.cmd_inject_manager: Set the state of the inject manager service
Enter the interactive mode of the inject manager
help.p_Service_Name: Defines a valid MITM service. Obtain serivce names from the list_all command
help.p_State: A valid to bool convertable value for services
help.p_Service.State: Defines a valid service listing state
